data.name: Heavy Float Pack
data.detailed_description:
Heavy Float DLC Pack was created to satisfy your need for some really powerful float fishing tackle! Ever felt like you just can’t seem to get the muscle you need out of your “weapons” when battling a real monster in a fish fight? Then the Heavy Float DLC Pack is just right for you!

Heavy Float DLC Pack is a real tackle powerhouse, featuring the all new and ultra powerful Brutus match rod from Garry Scott with perfectly balanced flawless action, the super muscular back drag Espira DoublePunch spinning reel from MagFin with a special long cast spool, some heavy-load floats, super sturdy monolines and flurs, large hooks, savvy live baits, a large fishkeeper and other brawny goodies to match the mightiest of underwater adversaries!

Now this is one real tackle powerhouse we’re talking about here! Be it Blue Catfish, Trophy Carp, Lake Sturgeon or any other large, trophy-sized predator you might think of going after, with the brawny goodies from the Heavy Float DLC Pack you’ll be armed to the teeth and ahead of the game whatever the deep waters may bring!

RODS

  • Brutus 3 m
  • Brutus 3.3 m
  • Brutus 3.6 m

REELS

  • EspiraDoublePunch 4500
  • EspiraDoublePunch 5500
  • EspiraDoublePunch 6500

FLOATS

  • Pear Shaped Float
  • Pear Shaped Float
  • Pear Shaped Float
  • Pear Shaped Float
  • Ball Float
  • Ball Float
  • Glow Float
  • Glow Float

LINES 1000 meters each

  • Mono 0.35 mm
  • Mono 0.4 mm
  • Mono 0.45 mm
  • Mono 0.5 mm
  • Fluoro 0.35 mm
  • Fluoro 0.4 mm
  • Fluoro 0.45 mm
  • Fluoro 0.5 mm

HOOKS

  • Hook #1/0
  • Hook #2/0
  • Hook #3/0
  • Hook #4/0
  • Hook #5/0
  • Hook #6/0
  • Hook #7/0
  • Hook #8/0
  • Hook #9/0
  • Hook #10/0

BAITS

  • Large Cutbait
  • Crawfish Cut
  • Large Minnows
  • Shiners
  • Crawfish
  • Frog
  • Shrimp
  • Leeches
  • SpawnSack
  • Blood
  • Night Crawlers
  • Corn

KEEPNET

FishCabin M Plus

ROD CASE

Triple Case

TACKLE BOX

BigBox XL

Plus our unique Genesis Beta Tester Cap - an exclusive accessory!

data.short_description: Heavy Float DLC Pack was created to satisfy your need for some really powerful float fishing tackle! Ever felt like you just can’t seem to get the muscle you need out of your “weapons” when battling a real monster in a fish fight? Then the Heavy Float DLC Pack is just right for you!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64, Mac OS X
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
